content.prompt: In the xy-plane, the graph of the twice-differentiable function y = f(x) is concave up on the open interval (0, 2) and is tangent to the line y = 3x - 2 at x =1. Which of the following statements must be true about the derivative of f ?

choices.label: f ' (x) is constant on the interval (0.9, 1.1).

topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
